name: WP EMI Calculator
author: omikant, wptutorialspoint

sections.description:
WP EMI Calculator plugin is for Add Icons with this Shortcode ‘[emi-calculator]’.
Please check DEMO on this Link http://www.wptutorialspoint.com/wordpress-emi-calculator-plugin .

Shortcode Options

As of version 1.0, Please use ‘[emi-calculator]’ or <?php echo do_shortcode('[emi-calculator]'); ?> shortcodes.

Credits

This Plugin was written by WP Tutorials Point WordPress Team.
sections.installation:
The easy way:

  1. Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress
  2. Search for “WP EMI Calculator”
  3. Click ‘Install’
  4. Activate the Plugin

Please check DEMO on this Link http://www.wptutorialspoint.com/wordpress-emi-calculator-plugin .

Manual Installation

  1. Download the plugin file from this page and unzip the contents
  2. Upload the wp-emi-calculator folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the wp-emi-calculator plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Once Activated

  1. Place the [emi-calculator] shortcode in a Page or Post.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

The easy way:

  1. Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress
  2. Search for “WP EMI Calculator”
  3. Click ‘Install’
  4. Activate the Plugin

Please check DEMO on this Link http://www.wptutorialspoint.com/wordpress-emi-calculator-plugin .

Manual Installation

  1. Download the plugin file from this page and unzip the contents
  2. Upload the wp-emi-calculator folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the wp-emi-calculator plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Once Activated

  1. Place the [emi-calculator] shortcode in a Page or Post.

The Slider Shortcode

Place the [emi-calculator] shortcode in a Page or Post

Can I insert the carousel into a WordPress template instead of a page?

Absolutely – you just need to use the do_shortcode WordPress function. For example:
